participant_1.background:
I like playing music and being outside, even when it's not the best weather.
i speak fluent french.
I fell and sprained my ankle while hiking last year.
i volunteer in my sons boy scout troop.
i am almost finished with my degree.

participant_2.background:
I dance for an hour every day to Prince songs.
I remember buying a video game console so I can play with my son.
I started a bakery to help me cope with my mental health.
i am a military veteran.
I cherish my favorite pair of running shoes.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing?
Doing well! I am just getting ready to go for a run.
Nice! I love to run, too. I was in the military and it was a big part of my life.
That's awesome! I am a veteran, too. I started running to help with my mental health.
That's great! I am glad to hear that running has been helpful for you.
Thank you! It has been a great way for me to cope with stress.
I agree! I also love the feeling of being outdoors and getting some exercise.
Me too! It's a great way to clear your head and relax.
What type of music do you like to listen to while you run?
I love to dance while I run, so I usually listen to Prince songs.
That's a great idea! I love to dance, too.
It's a great way to get some exercise and have fun at the same time.
I agree! I love dancing to Prince songs. They're so upbeat and fun.
Me too! They're the perfect way to get me motivated to run.
I'm glad to hear that! I love running and dancing, so I'm happy to hear that you have found a way to combine the two.
Me too! It's been a great way for me to stay active and healthy.
I agree! I'm glad that running has been so helpful for you.
Thank you! I am glad that I found it.
Me too! I'm glad that we could talk about running and dancing.
Me too! It was a lot of fun.
I'm glad! I hope we can talk again soon.
Me too! I'd love to chat about running and dancing again.
